FuncDef: This command configures the time interval, in seconds, to send complete sequence number (CSN) PDUs from the interface. IS-IS must send CSN PDUs periodically.

ParaDef.Info: The time interval, in seconds between successive CSN PDUs sent from this interface expressed as a decimal integer.

ExtraInfo: Default: csnp-interval 10 - CSN PDUs are sent every 10 seconds for LAN interfaces.csnp-interval 5 - CSN PDUs are sent every 5 seconds for point-to-point interfaces.
